items.text:
https://github.com/jeyjeyemem/Xer.Cqrs

Library was built to aid in building decoupled apps based on the Command Query Responsibility Segregation (CQRS) pattern.

Some of the features: - Command/query/event handling through interfaces or through attributes. - Hosted handlers - Integration with IoC containers
items.title: I am developing an open source CQRS library. Would love to hear your feedback :)

items.text:
like every second person, i invested some money in crypto. I have a few different coins in kraken and coinbase.

I want an app/website to show me a simple view of my portfolio to tell me how much i am up/down on each coin, cost, value, etc...

I use blockfolio on the iphone but it is pretty crappy.

Ideally, the app would integrate automatically to the exchanges and pull down my data so I don't have to type in every transaction.
items.title: Ask HN: Is there a good portfolio app/site for tracking my crypto investments?
